thread.title: Bernie Sanders Sees Massive Debate Boost, Makes Big Jump In Polls And Fundraising
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders Sees Massive Debate Boost, Makes Big Jump In Polls And Fundraising - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders Sees Massive Debate Boost, Makes Big Jump In Polls And Fundraising
text: Bernie Sanders is seeing a significant jump after his debate performance, climbing in the polls and raising more than $2 million in a span of just 24 hours. A large portion of America just got their first introduction to the Vermont senator, whose public stature has not come close to matching that of the former...
